articles.title: Suhana Khan In A Purple Dress Takes "KKR Colours" To The Red Carpet - NDTV
articles.description: Suhana Khan missed the KKR vs DC IPL match but didn't miss showing her KKR support on the red carpet in a purple dress
articles.content:
Suhana Khan's purple dress is a fitting way to support KKR in style
